scripts.prisma:push: dotenv -e env.local -- prisma db push --schema packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate: dotenv -e env.local -- prisma migrate dev --schema packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma --name init
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/worker" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
